reason_learn_from_us.2: Designed specifically for beginners, our materials are presented simply and structured, helping you start your programming learning journey with confidence, even without prior experience.
reason_learn_from_us.3: We believe that the best learning process is achieved when materials are presented clearly and are easy to digest.

about_us.content.introduction.1: Welcome to NganggurDev - a learning hub for anyone who wants to use their free time to learn programming, whether they are beginners or already skilled in the field. We believe that everyone can learn programming languages regardless of their educational background or prior experience, and that is why we have designed content that is beginner-friendly, easy to understand, and systematically structured from the basics to advanced levels.
about_us.content.introduction.2: The name NganggurDev comes from the word 'nganggur' (Indonesian) which means someone who is unemployed, and 'dev' which is short for developer. The reason for choosing this phrase is the reality of what is happening in today's era, where many developers, especially website developers, find it very difficult to find jobs that match their field. However, as the CEO & Founder of NganggurDev, I don't want to give up. In fact, from this condition, I am encouraged to continue to create through the materials or articles that I make, so that they can be useful for anyone who wants to learn and develop in the world of programming.
about_us.what_we_offer.title: What we offer:
about_us.what_we_offer.list.1: Free programming articles and tutorials that can be accessed anytime.
about_us.what_we_offer.list.2: Multi-language support (EN | ID) so we can choose the language that is most comfortable for learning.
about_us.what_we_offer.list.3: Step-by-step guide complete with clear code examples and simple explanations.
about_us.what_we_offer.list.4: A series of tutorials on creating simple to complex projects using frameworks and non-frameworks.
about_us.content.closing: Our goal is to help more people discover their potential in the digital world, provide knowledge, and inspire them to continue learning..
about_us.content.criticism_and_suggestio: We greatly appreciate any constructive feedback to improve the quality of content and learning experience at NganggurDev. Every suggestion you provide is very meaningful to us in order to continue improving the material we present. Please feel free to contact us via email below:
about_us.close.title: Closing
about_us.close.description: Thank you for visiting NganggurDev. We hope that all the material we present will be useful, inspiring, and a first step for us to continue to grow in the world of programming.
privacy_policy.content:
This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you visit our website, which provides tutorial articles on programming languages. Our site supports multiple languages, including English (EN) and Indonesian (ID). We are committed to protecting your privacy and complying with applicable data protection laws. This policy is effective as of August 11, 2025. By using our website, you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy.

Information We Collect

We may collect the following types of information:

  • Non-Personal Information: Data collected automatically, such as IP address, browser type, device information, pages visited, time spent on pages, and referral sources. This is collected through cookies, web beacons, and similar technologies.

  • Usage Data: Interactions with our content, such as search queries or article views, to improve user experience.

We use Google Analytics and similar tools to track site usage, but we do not collect data that personally identifies you without your consent.

How We Use Your Information

  • To provide and improve our services, including personalized content in EN or ID based on your preferences.

  • For analytics purposes to understand user behavior and optimize the site.

  • To display advertisements via Google AdSense, which may use your data to serve relevant ads.

  • To comply with legal obligations or protect our rights.

Cookies and Tracking Technologies

Our website uses cookies to enhance functionality and user experience. Cookies are small files stored on your device.

  • Essential Cookies: Necessary for site operation, such as language preferences (EN/ID).

  • Analytics Cookies: From third parties like Google Analytics to monitor traffic.

  • Advertising Cookies: Google AdSense uses cookies to track your visits across sites and display personalized ads based on your interests. You can opt out of personalized ads via Google's Ads Settings or by visiting www.aboutads.info.

Third-Party Services and Advertising

Our website may use third-party services, including advertising, which may collect information about your usage. We are not responsible for their privacy practices.

Data Security

We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is completely secure.

Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Changes will be posted here with the updated effective date. Continued use of the site constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.

Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at business.nganggurdev@gmail.com

Thank you for reading our privacy policy.
